 |                Action Replay Version 1.14b (C) Datel                 |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |  Publisher..: Datel Ltd.                Origin..: Pal - Europe       |
 |  Released...: February 13th, 2005       Format..: GCM/DVD(Mini)      |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------|
 |                                                                      |
 | NFO:                                                                 |
 | ----                                                                 |
 | Latest version of the world famous cheat system from Datel...        |
 |                                                                      |
 | UNLEASH THE POWER OF YOUR GAMECUBE WITH ACTION REPLAY                |
 |                                                                      |
 | Welcome to Action Replay, the incredible new cheat system that       |
 | unleashes the true power of your Nintendo GameCube.                  |
 |                                                                      |
 | With Action Replay even a complete novice can become a real gaming   |
 | guru overnight! - Action Replay is the only cheat system designed    |
 | specifically for GameCube. Using Datel&#039;s advanced proprietary        |
 | technology, the Action Replay cheat system can unlock even the very  |
 | toughest games at the press of a button.                             |
 |                                                                      |
 | For more information check:  <a href=" http://www.codejunkies.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.codejunkies.com/</a>            |
 |                                                                      |
 | Special Note:                                                        |
 | -------------                                                        |
 | Disc was full tested with Viper GC Mod-chip on Dvd-r and mini dvd.   |
 | However you wont be able to boot games using it before viper guys    |
 | fixes the disc swap issue... No special memcard dongle needed, just  |
 | put a cleanly formatted 251 block card into slot 2 and it will work  |
 | just fine...                                                         |
 |                                                                      |
 |----------------------------------------------------------------------|
 | Application:                                                         |
 | ------------                                                         |
 | We are currently looking for some more Rare people to join us.       |
 | This is a rare chance to join the premier Gamecube group, you will   |
 | not regret it !                                                      |
 |                                                                      |
 | The Following Talented People are required:                          |
 |                                                                      |
 | - Suppliers : You work for a GAMES or MOVIES or UTILS, Distributor,  |
 |               Magazine, Warehouse, Publisher, press/marketing        |
 |               company, duplicator, courier delivery firm, tv/radio   |
 |               show, language translator company or store.            |
 |                                                                      |
 | - Suppliers : You can get NEW unreleased GAMES or MOVIES or UTILS,   |
 |               from one of the above Game/Util/Video shop (such as,   |
 |               Baggages, Electronics Boutique, FuncoLand, Media Play, |
 |               Software Etc. GameStop, Baggage&#039;s, etc.).              |
 |                                                                      |
 | - Suppliers : You live in the Usa, Canada, Uk, Europe, Japan, New    |
 |               Zealand or Australia, have a fast upload line (500kb/s |
 |               minimum) and free week days morning or afternoon.      |
